section.name: Introduction
section.p: In this chapter some examples will show how to use the Migration Plugin goals:

subsection.name: Generic Plugin configuration information
subsection.p: Before starting, please take a look at the following links to know more how to include and configure Maven plugins in the POM project:

subsection.name: pom.xml Plugin configuration
subsection.p: To use Migration Maven plugin in your project you have to configure your pom.xml file like this: <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.mybatis.maven</groupId> <artifactId>maven-migration-plugin</artifactId> <version>X.X</version> <configuration> <repository> [migration repository path] </repository> </configuration> <dependencies> [ add your jdbc driver depencency ] </dependencies> </plugin> <plugins>

subsection.name: The migration:status goal
subsection.p: This goal prints the current migration status of database. A tipical output could be:
subsection.pre:
mvn migrate:status -Dmigration.path=/path/to/migration/repository
...
[INFO] Executing Apache Migration StatusCommand [INFO] ID Applied At Description [INFO] ================================================================================ [INFO] 20100400000001 ...pending... create changelog [INFO] 20100400000002 ...pending... first migration [INFO] 20100400000003 ...pending... second migration [INFO] ...

subsection.name: The migration:check goal
subsection.p: checks the current status of your database migration and fails if one or more script are pending. A typical use of this goal is check the migration status into your maven build life cycle:
this goal fails if migration plugin founds one or more pending script. To skip the migration check set the properties migration.skip like this:

subsection.name: Site report for Maven 2 projects
subsection.p: You can configure your pom.xml to create a simple report of your database status:
subsection.source:
<build> ... <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.mybatis.maven</groupId> <artifactId>maven-migration-plugin</artifactId> <version>X.X</version> <configuration> <repository> [migration repository path] </repository> </configuration> <executions> <execution> <id>migration-chack</id> <phase>test</phase> <goals> <goal>check</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> <dependencies> <dependency> [your jdbc dependency] </dependency> </dependencies> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
<reporting> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.mybatis.maven</groupId> <artifactId>maven-migration-plugin</artifactId> <version>X.X</version> <configuration> <repository> [migration repository path] </repository> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </reporting>
